about_the_game:
This pack includes:

  • A Premium squad of 5 level 4 guerrillas armed with a captured MP-719(r) submachine gun (Rank 2, Germany)

  • TNT charge

  • 200 gold

MP-719(r) is the German designation for the captured Soviet submachine gun PPS-43. A significant number of these weapons fell into enemy hands, and towards the end of the war, they were actively used by Volkssturm armed units. Due to its compactness and light weight, the MP-719(r) was ideal for sabotage operations. The weapon was known for its reliability and ease of use, which was especially important in conditions with limited maintenance capabilities. The MP-719(r) was used in various sabotage actions, such as ambushes on retreating columns and patrols of Allied forces. The submachine gun uses 7.62mm rounds and is equipped with a 35-round magazine. It fires in full-auto mode. In the game, the MP-719(r) ammunition can be replenished at enemy ammo crates.

Guerilla class features:

  • Guerrillas can remain in the enemy's combat zone without penalties.

  • Ability to carry 5 charges of TNT .

  • Guerrillas receive a full ammunition load from weapons found on the battlefield
